channel.title: Configuring default umask?
channel.description:
Hi all, I realize changing the default `umask` only has limited benefit, but nonetheless I would like to set it to `077`.
I've tried everything I can think of - all the profile config files in my home directory, the login defaults configuration file, etc, yet nothing seems to work.
What am I missing? TIA
